item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Dollar weakens as investors rein in bets on Trump victory
2. Trump and Harris make final push to break US election deadlock
3. Ukraine says it has attacked North Korean troops in Kursk
4. Trump lashes out as race with Harris goes down to the wire
5. UK tax plan for wealthy foreigners risks turning London into ‘bigger version of Bahamas’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
